TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LassoSelectionChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Gets the strokes that have been removed from lasso path since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"> event was raised.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> that contains the strokes that have been removed from the lasso path since the last time the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged> event was raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is removed from the lasso path when it is no longer within the bounds of the lasso path.

Docs.summary: Gets the strokes that have been surrounded by the lasso path since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged"> event was raised.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"> that contains the strokes that have been surrounded by the lasso path since the last time the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged> event was raised.
